Class PolicyGrant

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglets.security.PolicyGrant

public class PolicyGrant
extends java.lang.Object

The PolicyGrant class represents a grant of Java policy database.

getPermissionCount

public final int getPermissionCount()
Returns the number of the permission stored whitin this grant.

Returns:
the number of permission within this grant, zero if there are no permissions.

getSignersCount

public final int getSignersCount()

Returns:

getOwnersCount

public final int getOwnersCount()
Returns the number of onwers for this policy grant.

Returns:
the numbero fo owners or zero if no one has been specified.
